Farmers have a plethora of problems. And, who can understand these problems best? None other than a farmer. And, who can solve these problems best? None other than a farmer. And, who can give a solution based on technology? None other than a farmer. But, a farmer who strides agriculture sector just as comfortably as the technology sector is the only one who can give a solution.

We have over 500 years of farming in their blood. They come from a very respectable farming family from the historical town of Belur in Hasan district of Karnataka, India. Growing up playing cricket in a land that seemed to have no end, among orchards of banana, mangoes, sapota, avocado and fields of millets, pulses and cereals, seeing the well-off tourists from across the globe set their minds thinking.
